title: ProviderResponse
description: A response object for remote providers of AS Router

items.title: RouterMessage
items.description: A definition of an individual message

id.description: A unique identifier for the message that should not conflict with any other previous message

template.description: An id matching an existing Activity Stream Router template

bundled.description: The number of messages of the same template this one should be shown with (optional)

order.description: If bundled with other messages of the same template, which order should this one be placed in? (optional - defaults to 0)

content.description: An object containing all variables/props to be rendered in the template. See individual template schemas for details.

targeting.description: A JEXL expression representing targeting information

trigger.description: An action to trigger potentially showing the message

id.description: A string identifying the trigger action

params.description: An optional array of string parameters for the trigger action

items.description: A parameter for the trigger action

frequency.description: An object containing frequency cap information for a message.

lifetime.description: The maximum lifetime impressions for a message.

custom.description: An array of custom frequency cap definitions.

items.description: A frequency cap definition containing time and max impression information

oneOf.description: Period of time in milliseconds (e.g. 86400000 for one day)
One of a preset list of short forms for period of time (e.g. 'daily' for one day)

cap.description: The maximum impressions for the message within the defined period.
